trans-unit.source: Provides data for any events that occur when a user clicks an image-based ASP.NET server control, such as the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton"></xref> server controls.
This class cannot be inherited.
This class passes the location where a user clicked an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> server control or an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> Web server control.

Clicking an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> server control causes a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.ServerClick> event to occur, while clicking an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> server control causes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click> event to occur.
You can then use event handlers to programmatically respond to the event based on the value of these coordinates.
> [!NOTE] > The origin coordinates (0,0) are located at the upper left corner of the image.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
Initializes a new instance of the class using the x and y parameters.
The x-coordinate where the user clicked an image-based ASP.NET server control.
The y-coordinate where the user clicked an image-based ASP.NET server control.
Initializes a new instance of the class using the x, y, xRaw, and yRaw parameters.
The x-coordinate where a user clicked an image-based ASP.NET server control.
The y-coordinate where a user clicked an image-based ASP.NET server control.
The raw x-coordinate where a user clicked an image-based ASP.NET server control.
The raw y-coordinate where a user clicked an image-based ASP.NET server control.
An integer that represents the x-coordinate where a user clicked an image-based ASP.NET server control.
To be added.
An integer that represents the raw x-coordinate where a user clicked an image-based ASP.NET server control.
To be added.
An integer that represents the y-coordinate where a user clicked an image-based ASP.NET server control.
To be added.
An integer that represents the raw y-coordinate where a user clicked an image-based ASP.NET server control.
To be added.
